185998160.review:
This game is absolutely BAD ASS.

If you're looking for some heady, slow walking simulator like Alien Isolation (2014) this is not that game.

But if you're looking for 3 different action packed campaigns (playing as marines, alien, and predator) with tons of licensed audio from the movies as you blast away at xenos this game is AWESOME.

The jump scares in this game are wonderful. The gameplay is well done and full of variety. I can't say enough about how surprised I am that this game is so good.

185951330.review: Game is absolutely fantastic for lovers of Aliens VS Predator series. The main advantage is that you can play 3 different campaigns, as in games before, but that graphics for year 2010 is absolutely stunning! In my opinion the most difficult campaign is for a marine. This is really hard especially on hard difficulty, which I have passed. You are just a prey trying to survive between fight of two best monsters in the galaxies of the Universe. Playing as Alien and Predator, Yautja hunter you will really admire, because here you are hunter, you are the monster smashing other species, which got on your way. Finishing moves or grabs are brutal, which is shown by amazing graphics work, humans are here just a flesh torn by monsters. After so many times passed this games I would like to really recommend this game to AVP lovers and also FPS and SCI-FI lovers. 10/10 for me.

I play that game when it first released on PS3 in (2010) played the demo as well when it first released. The game was the goat at the time. Now it poorly aged and content is kinda weak.

6/10 game/port

Геймплей за чужого это просто жесть)) первые 30 минут было дико неудобно и голова кружилась, но как же бесили блоки и ваншоты когда слишком близко подходишь, но к этому привыкаешь и всплывает другая проблема (слишком уж мало хп у чужого) а так неплохо.
Геймплей за хищника тоже жесть та еще)
Стрелять из лазеров неудобно как и прицеливатся (мб это я просто рукажоп) и как же горел пердак от непробиваемых блоков от людей и чужих и эта москировка которую все видят)))

185232432.review:
The Hunt is On! 
Alien vs. Predator (2010) is Predator Perfection for me. 
As a lifelong fan of the Predators, Alien vs. Predator (2010) is everything I was hoping for. 
From the moment I donned the mask of the galaxy’s ultimate hunter, I felt right at home in the immersive, pulse-pounding world Rebellion created. 
The Predator campaign is the star of the show for me personally, delivering all the right tools to hunt worthy prey. 
From cloaking to thermal vision and that glorious plasma caster, the mechanics let you embody the cunning, lethal prowess of a true Yautja warrior! 
Every leap from treetop to treetop and every trophy claimed feels like a victory worthy of their legendary reputation.
The game’s three intersecting campaigns, Predator, Marine, and Alien, offer an experience as diverse as the franchise itself.
The Marine campaign is a masterclass in tension, evoking the terror of Aliens, while the Alien campaign lets you unleash pure carnage! 
But as a Predator fan, stalking my prey with precision and honor was the clear highlight.
The environments are a nostalgic blend of dense jungles, claustrophobic corridors, and eerie industrial settings, each drenched in atmosphere and lore. 
The sound design is top-tier, from the Predator’s iconic clicking to the haunting hiss of a xenomorph lurking nearby...
Sure, some of the mechanics and animations feel dated by today’s standards, but the heart of the experience, the thrill of the hunt, shines through!  
For anyone who’s spent years admiring the Predators, this game is pure joy.
Alien vs. Predator (2010) is a celebration of these legendary sci-fi icons. 
Whether you’re hunting, surviving, or wreaking havoc, it’s a love letter to fans, and as a diehard Predator fan, I couldn’t ask for much more.

185231258.review:
I'm only starting the third chapter of the marine campaign, but the fact that you block xenomorph attacks with your arms then pistol whip them is just so eye rollingly stupid it has soured the experience.

Update:  just finished the game. I can't think of a game since resident evil 6 that i had to push myself so hard to finish.

This game has great graphics and is very faithful to the respectful franchises.

But gameplay wise it's aggravating more than enjoyable

I'm sure some would say it's a "skill issue", and I'll admit I'm not great at games, I kinda run in guns blazing all the time

but yeah:

with the humans pistol whipping the aliens and blocking attacks with their hands

the aliens awkward as hell movement (even with the "auto wall traverse" off

and predators weapons that are supposed to make you feel powerful but I found they were unreliable. when I've got an alien barreling down at me and I'm pressing the throw spear / disc button repeatedly and it doesn't throw, and when it does the auto aim makes it miss

or the fact that with humans and predator you can only sprint for like 2 seconds. the sprint cool down is practically as long as the sprint duration

and you can't attack while running.

just frustrating experience.

i don't often write reviews but yeah, this is a heavily flawed game

185155447.review:
⚠️ Attention, instant critique d'un jeu par moi ⚠️

🎮 Nom du jeu : Alien VS Predator

📖 Histoire :Trois campagnes distinctes :

Marine : Vous incarnez un marine envoyé sur une planète pour sauver des civils. Cependant, tout tourne mal, et vous devez finalement éliminer Weyland, récupérer sa tablette et sauver votre commandante, Tequila.

Predator : En tant que Predator, votre mission est de déclencher l'autodestruction des poignets de force des Young Bloods tombés sur la planète. Vous découvrez que des scientifiques tentent d'acquérir les connaissances et technologies de vos ancêtres, tout en traquant un Predalien. Votre objectif est d'éliminer ce dernier et de détruire une ancienne pyramide pour éviter que la technologie ne tombe entre de mauvaises mains.

Alien : Vous jouez un Alien cherchant à s'échapper pour sauver sa reine. Après l'avoir secourue, vous devez vous venger des humains qui tentaient de vous utiliser comme arme, et ainsi commencer une nouvelle infestation.

💡 Infos sur le jeu : Un mélange d'horreur, d'infiltration et d'action.

📝 Critique : J'adore ce jeu ! J'y ai joué sur PS3, et je ne m'en lasse pas. L'histoire n'est certes pas très complexe, mais les graphismes sont intéressants. Le gameplay est fluide et facile à prendre en main. Les personnages sont sympathiques, à l'exception du marine que j'ai trouvé un peu ennuyeux. Chaque minute passée sur ce jeu a été un plaisir.
Cependant, il y a un point négatif : les ennemis humains et androïdes sont frustrants. Leur précision est démesurée, surtout celle des androïdes. Peu importe si vous êtes furtif ou camouflé, ils vous détectent presque toujours et infligent des dégâts, ce qui peut être assez agaçant.

👍🏻  Je le conseille ou pas : Oui, je le recommande vivement !

🕯️ Autres infos : Le jeu est assez court et peut être terminé rapidement. Il suit une progression linéaire sans quêtes secondaires.

184802209.review:
Aliens vs. Predator™ es el sueño hecho realidad para cualquiera que haya debatido en el recreo quién ganaría en una pelea: ¿los xenomorfos, los Depredadores o un humano con más agallas que sentido común? Spoiler: el humano eres tú, y la respuesta es 'nadie gana, pero todos pierden'.

El juego te deja vivir tres experiencias diferentes:

Como Marine: Pasas el 90% del tiempo escuchando ruidos raros y el otro 10% preguntándote por qué entraste a esta línea de trabajo.
Como Xenomorfo: Te mueves por paredes y techos como un ninja alienígena, pero te preguntas por qué todo el mundo tiene linternas para descubrir tus épicas emboscadas.
Como Depredador: Tienes la tecnología más avanzada de la galaxia... y la habilidad de morir porque calculaste mal un salto o activaste el camuflaje en el momento equivocado.
El multijugador es donde el caos realmente brilla: nada como perseguir a un Depredador siendo un Xenomorfo, solo para que un Marine te explote con un lanzallamas desde el otro lado del mapa. Es básicamente un triángulo amoroso de traiciones y explosiones.

Los gráficos han envejecido como un Depredador después de un mal día, pero la atmósfera sigue siendo pura ciencia ficción de los '80: oscura, tensa y llena de momentos en los que piensas 'esto no puede empeorar'... y aparece un Facehugger.

En resumen, Aliens vs. Predator™ es imperfecto pero absolutamente entretenido, especialmente si amas estas franquicias. 8/10, volvería a ser asfixiado por un Facehugger por la ciencia.

184790529.review:
Я опишу свои впечатления о трех разных сторонах в гемйплее.
Десантник - какая то тухлятина, слишком затянутая компания
Чужой - за него самая динамичная и интересная механика на мой взгляд. Фаталити более разнообразные и изощренные. Рвешь, отрываешь, протыкаешь, пробиваешь, отрезаешь. За него прям чувствуется погружение. Удручает, что за самую интересную сторону сделали напротив самую короткую компанию. 
Хищник - Его как будто не доделали, забили х.уец. Эти бесполезные половину его механик, по типу бомб и плазменных пушек, которые мало эффективны+мало энергии. Пол игры пользоваться диском и копьем такое себе удовольствие. В чем интерес такого геймплея, хз.
Игра явно не дотягивает, полно нюансов, недоработок касательно геймдизайна, из за чего игра кажется сырой. Атмосфера хорошо передана, но этого недостаточно, чтоб считать игру полноценной.

184044296.review: il gioco ha tre campagne : marine. predator e alien ; tutte e tre si svolgono - più o meno - nei medesimi ambienti. Nelle vesti di marine si gioca ad un fps classico : l'atmosfera fanta-orrorifica c'è e in più di un' occasione mette i brividi, il gameplay stracollaudato funziona bene ; nelle vesti di predator si fa un' esperienza diversa e più originale dove si possono utilizzare tutti i gagets di cui è dotato il predator, in questa versione ci si trova di fronte ad un modo di giocare che, per quanto nè so, è inedito, forse il gameplay non è sempre perfetto e c'è qualche "sbavatura" ma nel complesso non è male ; nelle vesti dell' alieno invece il gioco è deludente tuttavia le prime due campagne da sole valgono il viaggio secondo i lmi parere.

183989710.review: the game worked until it didnt and there is no solution besides downloading random exe files which i dont recommend doing just avoid the game shame too because i was actually enjoying the game until it decided not to work look in the community hub or negative reviews and they will say the same issue i have updating executable then it doesnt launch this ironically serves as a great promotion for drm free stores like gog while its still digital the games work offline and have no drm and i cant refund this game so until its fixed if ever it may as well not even be in my library i thought it was gonna be fixed by now since i and others have been waiting for it to be fixed and to be clear this isnt a direct knock at steam for the most part its usually great and i did exceed the limits of the refund policy so i am not upset at that i am just pointing out how flawed drm itself is and how games can just not work at any time this is why drm free and physical media and not being tied to a server is important

183835437.review: My favorite game and also my favorite franchise!

183822338.review: This game is, in my opinion, under-rated. It is a masterpiece which can actually describe some of the events that happened in the Aliens vs. Predators universe with a sort of "find the lore" which is pretty cool. And the multi-player is dead for some people who wanted to play it with some DLC content. Worry not, because you can go in multi-player and then player match, then after that you can select the survivor tab and use the maps you paid for which include the hive. In a map where you are playing in survivor mode that has eggs in it, just so you know the eggs open every couple waves so they don't open automatically at your presence like in the movies. Also, if you get attacked by a Facehugger you don't get a chance to rip it off of your face like in Aliens: Colonial Marines and Aliens: Fireteam Elite but there is still a chance that you can get it off but there is not anything you can do to boost your chances of getting it off successfully and not being able to do so, which would result in your death. I would recommend this game for other members of the Aliens vs. Predator franchise to play this game because it has really good graphics, storyline and plot. Also just so you know, per say if someone played only marines and got to level 39, the Predator and Xenomorph would also be at that exact level because they would be the same rank as you go up the ranks. If you completed every mission on any mode you could replay any mission you wanted in the same campaign with any difficulty but it would not count if you were in the Alien campaign and completed every mission on easy mode and then went back to the last level but switched the mode to hard it would not count for achievements where you need to complete the game in the Alien campaign on hard mode, since you only did one of the missions. And also in my opinion the bosses are not too overpowered because the last Predator boss in Alien campaign only heals themselves if you didn't get them in a couple minutes. Also for new players, the Predator campaign has more bosses than in any of the other campaigns because the other campaigns of Marine and Alien have only about one or two bosses. This game is one that I think should have way more recognition, because once you play it you would know how good it really is. But just so you know since the fact of the multi-player option being quite dead, as I said near the beginning of the review you will probably only be able to play marine unless you have friends to play with because other-wise the yautja and the Xenomorph don't really have a use where you can use the skins you have obtained from them in ranks if you don't have friends to play with because there is some times when multi-player is not dead, but that is a little rare nowadays because my assumption is that people moved on to other games that are still getting fame, or maybe if they didn't move out of playing Alien/Yautja type games maybe they started to play a different game that is newer. Though I kind of wish there was an option where you could play with bots for multi-player, but that might not get added since you play single-player in order to complete the base story which is probably why Aliens: Fireteam Elite got the bot option since you need to play multi-player for the base game which is basically dead as a desert unless you play the very first part of the first mission where you get a full team in a couple of minutes which is very quick for a game that is practically not played anymore. So you might not want to get the DLC maps if you do not want to play single-player in multi-player where you are a marine packing Xenomorphs full of bullets, which you can do by going to the multi-player and then player-match and then creating your own game, which you can also play with more people by friending them and going to steam chat and inviting them to join the Aliens vs. Predator game but they do have to own the game in order to play it with you. This game is also challenging, but not the type of challenging that would make you mad and never want to play the game again, it is more of a game that would be like "Oh! If I get better at this, I will be able to beat this game!" Because there is a difference between "I can beat this game, just gotta give it a few more tries" and "I will never play this game again!" Because this game knows perfectly how to blend challenging moments and easy moments together to make a combination of a great game that I could play every day (I might already do that.) Somehow, the graphics even hold up to this day which is really surprising for a game made in 2010. I also like some of the references that they may have put into this game (Though I do not have much knowledge of it being accidentally made a reference or if on purpose). One of them being when you are playing as a Predator in the Predator campaign one of the finish kills, which if you do not know what a finish kill is, it is when you either hit an enemy once or stalk around
